name: A Watch or The Incredible Shrink
name_original: A Watch or The Incredible Shrink
description:
You are getting sleepy… Watch the watch until you go deeper into the next level of consciousness. Then you keep going. And going. Listen to the ticks….

And the tocks.

Don’t wake up. Unless?

Tips: Pay attention to your surroundings for clues on what to do. Here’s a hint: At first you just need the “A” key on your keyboard. After falling into the first level of hypnosis, you will need more keys. Look at everything to figure out what’s left.
